title: UK Lakeside Birmingham Escape Adjacent to National Exhibition Centre
description: Experience the endless entertainment and sprawling shops of the National Exhibition Centre from the stylish Crowne Plaza Birmingham NEC, an IHG Hotel. Nestled next to the glittering Pendigo Lake, the hotel is adjacent to the 11-screen cinema and casino at Resorts World Birmingham, as well as the concerts at Resorts World Arena. After days of fun out on the town, dine at the sumptuous Eleven Bar and Grill, keep up your fitness routine in the gym or enjoy a drink at Lobbyist Lounge Bar.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Birmingham NEC, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: National Exhibition Centre, Pendigo Way, Marston Green, Birmingham B40 1PS, United Kingdom

vendor_name: Holiday Inn Express Birmingham - City Centre
title: Modern Birmingham City Centre Stay with Onsite Cafe & Bar
description: Discover a relaxing escape in lively Birmingham at Holiday Inn Express Birmingham - City Centre, an IHG Hotel. Treat yourself to some retail therapy with a 10-minute walk to Grand Central shopping centre, catch a show at the Birmingham Hippodrome theatre or marvel at colourful marine life at the National SEA LIFE Centre. At the end of the day, find a comfortable spot to kick your feet up in the bright and spacious lobby or enjoy your favourite drink and tasty snacks at the onsite cafe and bar.
location_description: Holiday Inn Express Birmingham - City Centre, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 19 Holliday Street, Birmingham, B1 1HH United Kingdom

vendor_name: Holiday Inn Express Birmingham - Star City
title: Central Birmingham Bliss with Express Cafe & Bar
description: Birmingham's buzz is never far away with a stay in the centrally located Holiday Inn Express Birmingham - Star City, an IHG Hotel. Before heading out to explore the nearby theatres, shopping malls and eye-popping street art, fuel up on a hot and hearty breakfast at the onsite cafe and bar, offering favourites like scrambled eggs, bacon, baked beans and sausages. After a day strolling the city's canals, return to your hotel's cafe and bar for a nightcap.
location_description: Holiday Inn Express Birmingham - Star City, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Cuckoo Road, Heartlands Parkway, Birmingham, B7 5SB United Kingdom

title: UK Central Birmingham City Break near Grand Central Station
description: Birmingham's bustling centre beckons visitors to explore - and where better to discover this charming heritage city than at Crowne Plaza Birmingham City Centre, an IHG Hotel? Indulge in sumptuous cuisine at B1 Restaurant and keep up with your fitness routine at the onsite gym before heading out to explore the sights. Find yourself under 10 minutes' walk from Grand Central Station and the elegant Symphony Hall, considered to be one of the finest concert halls in the world.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Birmingham City Centre, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Central Square Holliday Street, Birmingham B1 1HH, United Kingdom

vendor_name: Holiday Inn Express Birmingham - Castle Bromwich
title: Quaint Birmingham City Break next to Historic Castle
description: Discover the backdrop of the famous TV series Peaky Blinders with a stay at Holiday Inn Express Birmingham - Castle Bromwich, an IHG Hotel. This charming city in the heart of England is both historic and culturally significant, with a budding restaurant scene, buzzing nightlife, and a celebrated love of the arts. Start each morning with a hearty English breakfast at the onsite Express Start buffet, offering hot and cold options to satisfy any craving.
location_description: Holiday Inn Express Birmingham - Castle Bromwich, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 1200 Chester Road, Birmingham B35 7AF, United Kingdom

title: Comfortable Redditch Escape with Breakfast Cafe
description: Escape to a picturesque country town just south of Birmingham with a relaxed stay at Holiday Inn Express Birmingham - Redditch, an IHG Hotel. Known for its delightfully sleepy atmosphere, Redditch is filled with historic monuments, and makes the perfect escape from the hustle and bustle of city living. Before heading out for a day of exploration, indulge in a tasty breakfast and warming cup of coffee at the hotel's Express Start buffet.
location_description: Holiday Inn Express Birmingham - Redditch, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 2 Hewell Road, Birmingham, B97 6AE United Kingdom
